page.description: Fires before any media files (photos, video, audio recordings) are download from a server, or Amazon S3 to the device for storage in the device file system when data are pull-synchronized. If this function returns false, the files will not be downloaded to the device. The 'afterMediaFilesDownload' event will still fire, and its e.aborted property will be set to true.

section.title: Parameters
section.description: This event passes an array parameter when the Javascript code executes.
